title: RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12017 IR Detection Module Overview
content: The RAK12017 is an IR detection module. This module uses ITR20001 optical switch from Everlight to detect whether the IR Signal reflects. Sample applications of this module are: to identify if an object is approaching and check changes between black and white lines.
parent_content: The RAK12017 is an IR detection module. This module uses ITR20001 optical switch from Everlight to detect whether the IR Signal reflects. Sample applications of this module are: to identify if an object is approaching and check changes between black and white lines.

title: RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Mounting
content:
The RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12017 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Module Mounting  
> **TIP:** NOTE
parent_content:
The RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12017 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Module Mounting  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- RAK12017 has a connector(default NC), and if you need to get the module out of WisBlock Base board, you can solder it with cable and [RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module](https://store.rakwireless.com/products/io-expansion-module-rak13003) to position the module however you like.

title: RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > Vendor and Part Number Information [TABLE]

RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12017 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **3V3_S**, **GND**, **AIN1**, **OUT** are connected to WisConnector.  
> **Image:** RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Module Pinout
parent_content:
The RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12017 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **3V3_S**, **GND**, **AIN1**, **OUT** are connected to WisConnector.  
> **Image:** RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Module Pinout

title: RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Mechanical Characteristics > WisConnector PCB Layout > WisConnector PCB Footprint and Recommendations [IMAGE]

RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12017 WisBlock IR Detection Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > WisConnector and RAK12017 Schematic Overview [TABLE]
content:
> **Image:** WisConnector and RAK12017 Schematic  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **3V3_S** is supported by WisBase.
- **AIN1** is an analog input.
- The voltage depends on reflection strength.
- The reverse level of MCP606 can be adjusted by indicator.
- **D1** is an LED used as an indicator light.
- **J2** is used for cable when the module is out of the base.
parent_content:
> **Image:** WisConnector and RAK12017 Schematic  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **3V3_S** is supported by WisBase.
- **AIN1** is an analog input.
- The voltage depends on reflection strength.
- The reverse level of MCP606 can be adjusted by indicator.
- **D1** is an LED used as an indicator light.
- **J2** is used for cable when the module is out of the base.
